Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = 10 ReloadTime = 0.25
AnimPlaying = nil
StormGui = Tool:WaitForChild("StormGui") StormRadius = 20
ControlFunction = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ControlFunction") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ControlFunction.Name = "ControlFunction" ControlFunction.Parent = Tool
PlayersNearby = {}
Equipped = false
ControlFunction.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "AnimationPlaying" and not AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying = Value wait(Value.Duration) AnimPlaying = nil end return false end)
function CheckTable(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not Character then return end local HitParent = Hit.Parent if HitParent:IsA("Hat") or HitParent:IsA("Tool") then HitParent = HitParent.Parent end if Hit.Parent == Character then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or (RightGrip.Part0 ~= Handle and RightGrip.Part1 ~= Handle) then return end local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage((AnimPlaying and AnimPlaying.Damage) or Damage) end end)
function GiveStormGui() Spawn(function() while Equipped do for i, v in pairs(Players:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Player") and v.Character and v ~= Player then local PlayerGui = v:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") local Torso = v.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if PlayerGui and Torso and not PlayerGui:FindFirstChild(StormGui.Name) and not CheckTable(PlayersNearby, v) then if (Torso.Position - Handle.Position).magnitude <= StormRadius then local StormGuiClone = StormGui:Clone() local Connection = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Connection.Name = "Connection" Connection.Value = Tool Connection.Parent = StormGuiClone StormGuiClone.LocalScript.Disabled = false table.insert(PlayersNearby, {Player = v, Gui = StormGuiClone}) StormGuiClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end end end for i, v in pairs(PlayersNearby) do if v.Player and v.Player.Character then local Torso = v.Player.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Torso or (Torso and (Torso.Position - Handle.Position).magnitude > StormRadius) then if v.Gui and v.Gui.Parent then v.Gui:Destroy() end table.remove(PlayersNearby, i) end end end wait(0.5) end end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end GiveStormGui() end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false Character = nil for i, v in pairs(PlayersNearby) do if v.Gui and v.Gui.Parent then v.Gui:Destroy() end end PlayersNearby = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ControlFunction = Tool:WaitForChild("ControlFunction")
Animations = { {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing1"), Duration = 1, Speed = 3, Damage = 12}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing2"), Duration = 1, Speed = 1.125, Damage = 8}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing3"), Duration = 1, Speed = 2, Damage = 6}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing4"), Duration = 1.25, Speed = 1.5, Damage = 10}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing5"), Duration = 1, Speed = 2, Damage = 7} }
LastAnimUsed = nil AnimReused = 0
function ChooseAnimation() local AnimChosen = Animations[math.random(1, #Animations)] AnimReused = ((AnimChosen == LastAnimUsed and (AnimReused + 1)) or 0) if AnimChosen ~= LastAnimUsed or AnimReused <= 1 then LastAnimUsed = AnimChosen return AnimChosen else return ChooseAnimation() end end
function Activated() if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 or SpecialActive or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end local AnimChosen = ChooseAnimation() SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(AnimChosen.Animation) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play(nil, nil, AnimChosen.Speed) AnimPlaying = AnimChosen end pcall(function() ControlFunction:InvokeServer("AnimationPlaying", {Name = AnimChosen.Animation.Name, Duration = AnimChosen.Duration, Damage = AnimChosen.Damage}) end) wait(AnimChosen.Duration) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
ScreenGui = script.Parent PlayerGui = ScreenGui.Parent Player = PlayerGui.Parent Frame = ScreenGui.Frame
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Frame:ClearAllChildren()
Connection = ScreenGui:WaitForChild("Connection")
Colors = {Color3.new(170, 170, 127), Color3.new(138, 138, 103)}
Directions = { Straight = { Min = UDim2.new(0, 30, 0, 0), Max = UDim2.new(0, 60, 0, 0) }, Left = { Min = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, -10), Max = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 10) }, Right = { Min = UDim2.new(0, 20, 0, 0), Max = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 0) } }
MaximumParticles = 350
LastTick = 0 WaitTime = 0
Particles = {}
function CreateParticle(Color) local Particle = Instance.new("ImageLabel") Particle.Name = "Particle" Particle.ZIndex = 1 Particle.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new((Color.r / 255), (Color.g / 255), (Color.b / 255)) Particle.BorderColor3 = Particle.BackgroundColor3 Particle.BorderSizePixel = 0 Particle.Size = UDim2.new(0, math.random(3, 4), 0, math.random(3, 4)) Particle.Position = UDim2.new(0, (0 - Particle.Size.X.Offset), 0, math.random(0, (Frame.Size.Y.Offset - Particle.Size.Y.Offset))) Direction = math.random(1, 3) Direction = ((Direction == 1 and Directions.Straight) or (Direction == 2 and Directions.Left) or Directions.Right) Particle.Parent = Frame table.insert(Particles, {Frame = Particle, Direction = Direction}) end
function SpawnParticles() if #Particles < MaximumParticles then for i = 1, math.random(1, 100) do if #Particles < MaximumParticles then CreateParticle(Colors[math.random(1, #Colors)]) else break end end end end
function AnimateParticles() for i, v in pairs(Particles) do local Direction = UDim2.new(0, math.random(v.Direction.Min.X.Offset, v.Direction.Max.X.Offset), 0, math.random(v.Direction.Min.Y.Offset, v.Direction.Max.Y.Offset)) v.Frame.Position = v.Frame.Position + UDim2.new(0, Direction.X.Offset, 0, Direction.Y.Offset) if v.Frame.Position.Y.Offset >= Frame.Size.Y.Offset or v.Frame.Position.X.Offset >= Frame.Size.X.Offset or v.Frame.Position.X.Offset <= (0 - v.Frame.Size.X.Offset) then v.Frame:Destroy() table.remove(Particles, i) end end end
function FunctionParticles() Spawn(function() repeat if not Connection.Value then DestroyGui() end if (tick() - LastTick) > WaitTime then LastTick = tick() WaitTime = math.random(0.1, 0.25) SpawnParticles() end AnimateParticles() wait(0.01) until false end) end
function FixScreenSize() Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.Y) end
function DestroyGui() Debris:AddItem(ScreenGui, 2) end
ScreenGui.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "AbsoluteSize" then FixScreenSize() end end)
if not Connection.Value then DestroyGui() end
FixScreenSize()
FunctionParticles()
